server.js.Description: Manages web agent processes and communications.
Functions: Start the web agent using '/start-web-agent' endpoint.
Send commands to web agent via '/command-web-agent' endpoint.
Update web agent's state using '/update-state' endpoint.
Poll the current state of web agent using '/poll' endpoint.

web_agent.js.Description: Handles web navigation, interaction, and decision-making.
Functions: Navigate web pages, click links, fill forms.
Make decisions based on OpenAI GPT-4 integration.
Automate browser to visit web pages.
Take and save screenshots of the current web page.

vision_scraper.py.Description: Processes visual content on web pages.
Functions: Analyze images or screenshots from web pages.
Extract and process data from visual content.
